content.raw:
There seems to be a problem if there is more than one sensor:

1. On an empty world, insert a camera, it is called `camera`

1. Then insert another camera, it's called `camera_0`

1. Click on the camera sensor for `camera`, the info shows, but some warnings are printed:

        [Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] world[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] model[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] link[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] sensor

1. Click on the camera sensor for `camera_0`, the info doesn't show and we get an error:

        [Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] world[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] model[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] link[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] sensor[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:939] Sensor [data://world/default/model/camera_0/link/link/sensor/camera] does not match sensor [data://default::camera::link::camera]
        [Err] [ModelListWidget.cc:3915] Failed to receive sensor info. Check server logs.
content.html:
There seems to be a problem if there is more than one sensor:

  1. On an empty world, insert a camera, it is called camera

  2. Then insert another camera, it's called camera_0

  3. Click on the camera sensor for camera, the info shows, but some warnings are printed:

    [Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] world[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] model[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] link[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] sensor

  4. Click on the camera sensor for camera_0, the info doesn't show and we get an error:

    [Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] world[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] model[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] link[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:909] sensor[Wrn] [SensorManager.cc:939] Sensor [data://world/default/model/camera_0/link/link/sensor/camera] does not match sensor [data://default::camera::link::camera]
[Err] [ModelListWidget.cc:3915] Failed to receive sensor info. Check server logs.
